inclusion.criterion: Male or female participants aged between 18 and 65 years inclusive.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient must be willing and able to participate in the study for the required duration, understand and sign the informed consent (ICF), and be willing to comply with all protocol-related visits and procedures.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient has had IBS-C symptoms (as defined by Rome III diagnostic criteria) for at least 6 months prior to diagnosis.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient has loose (mushy) or watery stools for > 25% of their bowel movements (BMs) during the 12 weeks before Screening or during the Screening and Pre-treatment Periods.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patient has a history of cathartic colon, laxative, or enema abuse.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient's symptoms suggest a possible case of cholera, which would make them ineligible for the study. However, further investigation is needed to confirm this diagnosis.
